title: Academic survey on player motivation (~10 min.) + Lottery (win up to 8250 RP!)
body:
Hello dear summoners,

two friends of mine from the University of Siegen, Germany, are conducting a survey in order to investigate motivational factors while playing LoL.

By participating in the study, you support their research and take part in a lottery where you can win 1 of 4 RP vouchers. The survey will take around 10 minutes.

**Survey link: http://tinyurl.com/z3ocgzs**

Thank you very much for your participation! Good luck on the fields of justice!

PS: Please feel free to share the survey! Thank you in advance! 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: It's an interesting survey, and I've got to admit it wasn't what I was expecting at all. Probably for the best that you avoided touching too much on the way players view toxicity in-game, though.
hey brah whats the title of your research paper?
Hey, there is no title yet. The research is still in its data acquisition phase.

aight man, filled out your survey.

i'm surprised there were no direct questions about toxicity.

i believe this game is a vent for the psychopathic tendencies of humans.
